original_title: キタの帝王 闇の咆哮
overview: The mysterious death of the perpetrator of sexual violence against women continues. Former lawyer Toshisuke Honmoto begins to work on solving the case. However, a group of men calling themselves the "Justice Restoration Group" appear before Honmoto, and a battle with them begins.
title: The King of Kita: Roar of Darkness
